attributes.action: stop any benefits being paid to anyone who defrauds the benefit system in any way and make sure they can never again claim any benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: should anyone defraud the benefit system and gets caught they should be made to pay back all money stolen from the system and then stopped from claiming any form of benefits ever again. even if it makes them have to work
